feed.title: What's Up Docker? Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 6.6.1
entry.content:
• :fire: [UI] - Fix container view (mobile layout)
  • :fire: [API/UI] - Sort by default containers by watcher, registry, name and version

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 7.0.0
entry.content:
• :star: [UI] - Add support for Selfh.st icons
  • :star: [Docker watcher] - Add new watchatstart option to disable automatic watch during startup

Breaking changes! \ WUD is moving to its own organization! \ - Github project is now located at https://github.com/getwud/wud - Docker image is now located at https://hub.docker.com/r/getwud/wud

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 7.1.0
entry.content:
• :star: [GOTIFY] - Add support for Gotify trigger
  • :star: [NTFY] - Add support for Ntfy trigger
  • :star: [PUSHOVER] - Add support for HTML templating
  • :fire: [UI] - Fix container list sort

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 7.1.1
New release for What's Up Docker?: 7.2.0
entry.content:
• :star: [TRIGGER] - Add support for associating specific triggers to specific containers
  • :star: [UI] - Some ux improvements
  • :star: [UI/API] - Add support for manually running triggers to help with configuration
